Arty's hit hard with the two missles, coolant and energeon begin to leak out
the cracks in his armored hide. "Branded, I could use some backup!" he
called over his comm. recieving static he tried again, "SwitchBlade, Dogged,
anyone come in, I'm hurting here, would someone fragging answer me?" he was
fealing overcome with fear, he'd either been abandoned or the others were
destroyed. either way it meant he was in big trouble. "That does it, I'm
outta here." his misslerack wings fold to the side and propell him through
one of the holes in the roof. If things were that bad he'd have to start
sending resumes out, maybe the combaticons were hireing an extra, then he
thought "Naaaaaa" he knew what always happened to extras.

From: <Yanshosh@...>

Sent: Thursday, June 07, 2001 10:16 PM
Subject: Re: The Ikoto


> Yeah, sure you were :-)

> The drunk rolls as Arty throws him out of the way, transforming back into
robot mode and jumping up. He fires two missiles at Arty, growling as he
runs toward him.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > OOC: I was trying to get the Autobots off the planet, but things
> > didn't go smoothly as planned. *glares at Cyberwolf* =P hehe
> >
> > --- Azafroth / Ikoto / Pacifix ---
> >
> > Azafroth watches with happenings at the Autobot hide out with
> > distaste. His translucent body shimmers as he decides to speed
> > up the process. He projects his thoughts to Pacifix, implanting a
> > thought into his head. << There is an enemy outside your ship, and
> > he is threatening to kill Commander Ironhide! I should save the
> > Commander. >> Azafroth shimmers even more brightly as he
> > observes his work in progress.
> >
> > Pacifix suddenly turns and spots a bot close to Ironhide. A though
> > races through his head, <<There is an enemy outside your ship,
> > and he is threatening to kill Commander Ironhide! I should save the
> > Commander.>> He runs towards the bot, and to the side, making
> > sure that there is nobody in his line of fire. His twin autocannons
> > begin firing in bursts of eight, and his arm freeze cannons launch
> > eight freeze blasts in total all directed at the bot near Ironhide,
Arty.
